location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to John Beaumont and George Green, Factors at Bushire from William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham at Bussora (Basra)

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged and has a hole in its text.

mods.abstract: Letter states that only 2,500 rupees is now required (due to some sales having been made) not 5,000 rupees as requested in previous letter (item IOR/R/15/1/2, f 41). Letter also states that Abraham is now on his way to Schiras [Shiraz] and that a letter for the council in Bombay is enclosed (this is not contained in the file).
